name: Shrimp with Garlic Cream Sauce over Linguine
author: Anonymous
summary: This shrimp and cream sauce is elegant enough to serve to dinner guests.
ingredients: 1 cup Original NESTLE COFFEE-MATE Powdered Coffee Creamer
16 each large shrimp, peeled and deveined
¾ cup BUITONI® Refrigerated Freshly Shredded Parmesan Cheese
1 (9 ounce) package BUITONI® Refrigerated Linguine, prepared at the last minute
directions: Whisk together water and Coffee-mate until smooth
Bring 6 cups water to a boil in medium saucepan
Add shrimp; cook for 2 minutes or until they turn pink
Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat
Add garlic; cook, stirring frequently, for 1 minute
Whisk in Coffee-mate mixture and cornstarch; whisk until cornstarch is dissolved
Cook, whisking occasionally, for 3 to 4 minutes or until sauce begins to thicken
Stir in parsley, cheese and shrimp
Season with salt and ground black pepper
Pour sauce over pasta; toss to coat
